Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize average story points delivered per sprint

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize achievement status of sprint goals

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize total effort across all tasks in a sprint

Name: minimize_feature_estimated_effort
Description: Prefer features with lower estimated effort

Name: maximize_story_points
Description: Maximize planned story points in the sprint

Name: minimize_sprint_backlog_task_count
Description: Keep sprint backlog compact by reducing number of tasks

Name: minimize_project_budget
Description: Minimize budget consumption at portfolio level

Name: maximize_backlog_health
Description: Maximize currency of backlog by favoring recently updated items

Name: minimize_blocker_age
Description: Reduce time-to-resolution by minimizing open duration of blockers
